metadata.title: CVE-2021-1871 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions. This issue is fixedin macOS Big Sur 11.2, Security Update 2021-001 Catalina, Security Update2021-001 Mojave, iOS 14.4 and iPadOS 14.4. A remote attacker may be able tocause arbitrary code execution. Apple is aware of a report that this issuemay have been actively exploited..

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
